subject: Carbon Fiber Heel Plate
description_text:
Hi, does your Carbon Fiber Heel Plate come with risers? I want to install it directly on my rig without Simsonn Baseplate.

https://www.simsonn.com/products/carbon-fiber-heel-plate-1ï¿¼
Carbon Fiber Heel Plate
simsonn.com

Thanks,
Visvaldas

conversations.body_text: Hi Visvaldas Stonkus,      Yes, we will provide an installation kit that you can use with other brands, but please verify compatibility.

Can you send me drawing dimensions to see gap between holes?
How long are the risers you include in the packaging?

>
